title: Carrot and apple soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '475g carrots, thinly sliced', '2 medium tart apples, peeled and chopped', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1 stick of celery, thinly sliced', '1.2L reduced salt chicken stock', '1/2 teaspoon dried sage', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '1 bay leaf']
